title: undanai nADi vandEn
sahitya:
undanai nADi vandEn uru tuNai tEDi vandEn kandanE iniyEnum kaDi tEralAm ena


anupallavi

  cendUril undan sEvaDi paNiya vandEn enda nALum inimEl nondiDAdirundiDa


caraNam    bandha vinaiyAl ini parppala vidhamAi nAn endat-tollaiyAlum innalE uTriDAdu
cintai padaikka enda shOdanaiyum udaikkAdu santOSam izhakkAda shAnti nilaikkavE
